meta.purpose: Alternative risk management without traditional stop loss
meta.concept: If setup doesn't work within expected time, it's wrong

action_if_no_profit.at_3_minutes: Check if price moved 2+ points in favor - if not, prepare exit
action_if_no_profit.at_5_minutes: Exit at market if no profit
action_if_no_profit.rationale: 5 min = enough time for quick scalp, if no profit = wrong setup

breakeven_rule.action: Move to breakeven, never let go negative

action_if_no_profit.at_10_minutes: Check if price moved 5+ points in favor - if not, prepare exit
action_if_no_profit.at_15_minutes: Exit at breakeven or small loss (max 2 points)
action_if_no_profit.rationale: 15 min = enough time for move to develop

breakeven_rule.rationale: Lock in profit once halfway to target

action_if_no_profit.at_20_minutes: Check if price moved 50% toward target - if not, prepare exit
action_if_no_profit.at_30_minutes: Exit - range may be breaking or setup invalid
action_if_no_profit.rationale: 30 min = enough time for range bounce

action_if_no_profit.at_40_minutes: Check if price moved 50% toward target - if not, prepare exit
action_if_no_profit.at_60_minutes: Exit if no progress toward target
action_if_no_profit.rationale: Trend trades can take longer, but should show progress

breakeven_rule.concept: Once trade moves in favor, protect profit
breakeven_rule.rationale: Never let winning trade become losing trade

trailing_profit.concept: Lock in profit as trade moves
trailing_profit.method: Move stop to +2 points profit, then trail
trailing_profit.rationale: Let winners run but protect profit

method.at_150_percent_target: Close 20% of position, let rest run

partial_exits.rationale: Lock profit while letting winners run

support_break.description: If long at support, exit if support clearly broken

resistance_break.description: If short at resistance, exit if resistance clearly broken

stochastic_reversal.description: If long and stochastic crosses down from overbought

auto_exit.reason: Give trader 5 seconds to manually exit before auto-exit

best_practices.discipline: Stick to time limits - if setup doesn't work in time, it's wrong
best_practices.breakeven: Always move to breakeven once profit develops
best_practices.partial_exits: Scale out to lock profit, let winners run
best_practices.review: Track which time-based exits saved money vs cost money

testing.backtest_method: Compare performance with vs without time-based exits
testing.success_metric: Fewer trades held too long, better win rate
